about_the_game:
Step up to the challenge and take a risk in the world of Storage Hunter Simulator, where you'll compete against others for the ultimate prize - garages filled with hidden treasures waiting to be discovered! In this exciting game, you'll have the chance to showcase your skills and become a giant of the storage market!

In this simulation game, you'll need to master the art of auctions, selling valuable items to wealthy collectors, and improving your skills as an appraiser to stay ahead of the competition. But that's just the beginning - the storage empire is waiting for you!

BID & WIN

Take risks and fight for garages. Find hidden treasures that no one else spotted. Become fierce competition that is well known and feared by others.

HUNDREDS OF ITEMS

With hundreds of unique items to discover, your knowledge and expertise will be put to the test as you work to uncover the true value of each item and maximize your earnings.

START YOUR OWN PAWNSHOP

Take your entrepreneurial skills to the next level and start your very own pawnshop empire. Build your business from the ground up and watch as you go from rags to riches.

name: Storage Hunter Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Play as one of the bidders for abandoned warehouses and uncover hidden treasures! Storage Hunter is a garage auction simulation game. Bid, win, and sell for profit! Become the king of storage auction.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
